original: 東吳官員，任交阯太守期間，因徵調當地勞役入朝，又命捕捉孔雀和野豬等物進貢，引發民怨，推舉郡吏呂興為首起事，殺孫諝等官吏，史稱「交阯之亂」。
text: An official of the Soochow Wu, during his term as prefect of the place, was ordered to capture peacocks and wild boars to pay tribute to the imperial court due to local labor, and caused public grievances. The county official Lv Xing was elected to take the lead to kill Sun Di and other officials. The chaos of the handover".
